results.title: Penguins off the page
results.brief_description: A biology teacher struggles to make his students pay attention to his lesson on different species of penguins. Little does he know that the very penguins he is discussing have come to life on his desktop, providing an amusing performance that brings his words to life. A plasticine animation in a live action classroom.
results.description: A biology teacher struggles to make his students pay attention to his lesson on different species of penguins. A plasticine animation in a live action classroom.

results.title: May day
results.brief_description: Forced to play inside during his holidays because of the rain a boy loses himself in games and reading and drifts off into a vivid world of daydreams

results.title: Killjoy
results.brief_description: A man and a woman literally tear strips off each other and uncover some nasty home truths. Innovative claymation about romance, false expectations and misconceived ideals.

results.creator_credit: John Sharpe, Sharon Parker, Alan Dorin, Marco Bresciani and Alastair MacInnes
results.brief_description: A group of men climb into a refrigerator and begin to devour its rather dubious contents. The film evokes the trick films of George Melies, made at the turn of the twentieth century

results.title: The Chase
results.creator_credit: Shaun Elstob, Anutaro Tantraporn, John Sharpe, Gillian Morisson and Sharon Parker
results.brief_description: A man snatches a baby off its mother as she leaves a train station. Distraught, she pursues and then attacks him. But how maternal are her instincts to protect her ‘bundle of joy’?
results.creator_credit_for_label: Shaun Elstob, Anutaro Tantraporn, John Sharpe, Gillian Morisson and Sharon Parker

results.title: Astrozoology 101
results.brief_description: An animation using the cutout techniques pioneered by Lotte Reiniger that revises the fairytale ‘The Frog Prince’. In this version the princess is a devouring alien.
results.description: An animation using the cutout techniques pioneered by Lotte Reiniger that revises the fairytale ‘The Frog Prince’. In this version the princess is a devouring alien.

results.title: Apoidea
results.brief_description: Computer animation about the evolution of a lily-like plant species on a watery planet. When the plants burst into bloom a swarm of metallic insects move in to fertilise its flowers. A violent ballet between insect and plant ensues.
